queries.aggrQuery: {"aggs":{"MS Enterprise":{"date_histogram":{"field":"interviewDateInMs","interval":"week"},"aggs":{"MS Enterprise":{"filter":{"bool":{"must":[{"terms":{"position.keyword":["Sharepoint","MS Dynamic AX Technical","MS Dynamic AX Functional","MS Dynamic CRM","AX Finance","AX T&L","Power BI"]}}]}},"aggs":{"Count":{"cardinality":{"field":"interviewDateInMs","precision_threshold":100}}}}}},"SAP":{"date_histogram":{"field":"interviewDateInMs","interval":"week"},"aggs":{"positions":{"filter":{"bool":{"must":[{"terms":{"position.keyword":["SAP EWM","SAP Basis","SAP PI PO CPI","SAP CPI","SAP IS Retail","SAP PM MM QM"]}}]}},"aggs":{"Count":{"cardinality":{"field":"interviewDateInMs","precision_threshold":100}}}}}},"Digital":{"date_histogram":{"field":"interviewDateInMs","interval":"week"},"aggs":{"positions":{"filter":{"bool":{"must":[{"terms":{"position.keyword":["Java","Java Architect","Dot Net Lead","Dot Net","Dot Net Architect","Java Lead","PHP ","Java ","Java Python","React JS","React UI Lead","Python","UI Lead","Java Fullstack","Java Lead ","React Native","React UI","Backend Developer","Data Scientist","PHP Moodle","UI Developer","WPF.NET"]}}]}},"aggs":{"Count":{"cardinality":{"field":"interviewDateInMs","precision_threshold":100}}}}}}}}

{"aggs":{"LOPAggr":{"filter":{"bool":{"must":[{"term":{"org.keyword":"Tarento"}},{"term":{"prjname.keyword":"Leave"}},{"term":{"tskname.keyword":"Loss of Pay"}}]}},"aggs":{"Loss Of Pay Hours":{"sum":{"field":"st","script":{"inline":"doc['st'].value / 60","lang":"painless"}}}}},"MaternityAggr":{"filter":{"bool":{"must":[{"term":{"org.keyword":"Tarento"}},{"term":{"prjname.keyword":"Leave"}},{"term":{"tskname.keyword":"Maternity Leave"}}]}},"aggs":{"Maternity Leave Count":{"cardinality":{"field":"uid"}}}},"PaternityAggr":{"filter":{"bool":{"must":[{"term":{"org.keyword":"Tarento"}},{"term":{"prjname.keyword":"Leave"}},{"term":{"tskname.keyword":"Paternity Leave"}}]}},"aggs":{"Paternity Leave Count":{"cardinality":{"field":"uid"}}}},"ExtendedMedicalAggr":{"filter":{"bool":{"must":[{"term":{"org.keyword":"Tarento"}},{"term":{"prjname.keyword":"Leave"}},{"term":{"tskname.keyword":"Extended Medical Leave"}}]}},"aggs":{"Extended Medical Leave Count":{"cardinality":{"field":"uid"}}}}}}
